staffactions.Train_JumpFallSide: Training %s the jump straight up trick
staffactions.Train_StraightUpJump: Training %s the jump and fall to the side trick
staffactions.Train_RamOutOfWater: Training %s the ram out of the water trick
staffactions.Train_JumpHoop: Training %s the jump through a hoop trick
staffactions.Train_NudgeBall: Training %s the nudge a ball trick
staffactions.Train_JumpFlukeSwipeTetherBall: Training %s the jump and swipe a tetherball with a buoy trick

superstaff.tankgate: Press SPACEBAR to climb the ladder
superstaff.sitonbleacher: Press SPACEBAR to sit in the %s
superstaff.getoffbleacher: Press SPACEBAR to get out of the %s
